text: Eadward kyngc gret alle mine bisceopes & mine eorles & mine þegenes on Barrocscire & on Middelsexen freondlice.

& ic kyþe eow þæt ic habbe gegifan Criste & Sancte Petre into Westmynstre Windlesoran & Stane & eall þæt þær to herð binnan burh & butan, mid saca & mid socne, mid tolle & mid teame & mid infangenum þeofe, on wude & on felde, be strande & be lande, on stræte & of stræte & on eallan þingan swa full & swa forð swa hit me sylfan on hande stod.
& ic nelle geþafian þæt þær æni mann ænine onstync þær ofer habbe <on> ænige þingan butan se abbot & þa mynekas to Sancte Petres neode.
